chapter.para: This example is JLEE application processing custom event fired by third party component(not JSLEE RA). Its only purpose is to acquaint user with means of communication with JSLEE platform.
This is very simple example. However it requires user to have knowledge on following subjects:

listitem.para: Naming and remote method calls are two services used by this example.
Java Connector Architecture is one of means of connecting to platform.
Basic knowledge on JSLEE activities and SBB lifecycle.
